text: Sidaway is a surname. Notable people with the name include: *Ashley Sidaway, British screenwriter and producer *Geoffrey Sidaway (1942–2014), British clergyman *Marlene Sidaway (born 1937), British television and film actress *Robert Sidaway (1758–1809), Australian convict of the First Fleet *Robert Sidaway (actor) (born 1942), British actor and writer ==See also == *Sidaway v Board of Governors of the Bethlem Royal Hospital, 1985 English court case *Sideways (disambiguation)
title: Sidaway
